description:
Spring arrives, and Haru`s dream of living with his brothers finally comes true. They move into a house together, and with the help of his former coworker Ikuyoshi, Haru`s plans to open a cafe seem to be coming aslong well... when something gives Haru cause for concern: Ren is staying cooped up inside his room. Annoyed by Ren`s attitude, Aki tells him he`s a useless kid unable to do anything on his own. Later, when Ren visits the home of Onodera, their apartment`s landowner...
Source: crunchyroll
